    #include<stdio.h>
      
    int main()
    {
    int t;
    int i,sum1,sum2;
    int arr[4][4];
    fscanf(stdin,"%d", &t);
    while(t--)
    {
    for(i=0; i<4; i++){
    fscanf(stdin,"%d%d%d%d", &arr[i][0], &arr[i][1], &arr[i][2], &arr[i][3]);
}
    sum1=arr[0][0]+arr[0][2]+arr[1][1]+arr[1][3]+arr[2][0]+arr[2][2]+arr[3][1]+arr[3][3];
    sum2=arr[0][1]+arr[0][3]+arr[1][0]+arr[1][2]+arr[2][1]+arr[2][3]+arr[3][0]+arr[3][2];
    sum1>sum2?fprintf(stdout,"%d\n",(sum1-sum2)):fprintf(stdout,"%d\n",(sum2-sum1));
    }
    return 0;
    }
